pages.text: With-in this addon 5 preservation modifications were added to help extend the life expectancy. They are as follows (by default): $(br2)Cool: $(4)80% Decay Rate$() $(br)Icy: $(4)50% Decay Rate$() $(br)Frozen: $(4)25% Decay Rate$() $(br)Freeze Dryed: $(4)10% Decay Rate$() $(br)Preserving: $(4)90% Decay Rate$()
